# Datasets

| File Name                                                                                              | Description                                                                | Source                |
|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------|
| Master Plan 2014 Subzone Boundary (No Sea) \[Shapefile\]                                               | Master Plan of Singapore showing planning areas and subzones in 2014       | data.gov.sg           |
| School Directory and Information \[CSV\]                                                               | Information including address of schools in Singapore                      | data.gov.sg           |
| malaysia-singapore-brunei-latest-free \[Shapefile\]                                                    | OpenStreetMap data                                                         | Geofabrik             |
| Singapore Residents by Planning Area / Subzone, Age Group, Sex and Type of Dwelling, June 2021 \[CSV\] | Demographic data about residents in each Planning Area and Subzone in 2021 | Singstat              |
| News articles                                                                                          | To find out which schools closed and merged                                | The Straits Times     |
| Official statements published by MOE                                                                   | To find out which schools closed and merged                                | Ministry of Education |
| Archive of all government schools in Singapore                                                         | To find out which schools closed and merged                                | Schools of Singapore  |
